Class ColorDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.onkiup.minedroid.gui.drawables.ColorDrawable

    Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public class ColorDrawable
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    Draws a colored rectangle
